Translations.Text: Zai ta zhihou, wo meiyou paiqian renhe tianbing qu chengzhi ta de zuren, wo bubi [wei ci shi] paiqian tianbing.
Zhi ting yisheng nahan [kongbu sheng], tamen dou bei miejuele.
Kebei de pu renmen! Zhiyao you shizhe lai jiaohua tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiao ta [zhu].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen [bei huimie de ren] jue buneng chong fan [chenshi]le.
Suoyou ren dou jiang bei dai dao wo zheli lai.
Kusi de dadi dui tamen shi yi zhong jixiang, wo ba ta fuhuo, jie ci shengchan chu guwu, gong tamen shiyong [zhu].
Wo zai da dishang chuangzaole xuduo ye zao yuan he putao yuan, bing shi xuduo quanshui congzhong yong chu,
yibian tamen chi qi guozi, naxie guozi bushi tamen qinshou zhizao de. Nandao tamen hai bu gan'en ma?
Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Ta chuangzaole ge zhong cheng dui de pei'ou, qizhong you dimian zhang chu de, yeyou chuzi tamen [nannu] ziji de, hai you tamen suo bu zhidao de.
Heiye dui tamen shi yi zhong jixiang, wo shi baizhou jinru heiye, tamen turan chu zai hei'an zhong.
Taiyang an yuding de chengxu yunxing, zhe shi quanneng de, quanzhi de zhu de qian ding.
Yueliang, wo ye wei ta guidingle [yunxing] chengxu, zhidao ta bian cheng gan qu de ye zao zhi yiyang.
Taiyang bu hui chaoguo yueliang [yunxing], heiye bu hui chaoyue baizhou [yunxing], ge zai yige guidao shang yunxing.
Dui tamen de yi zhong jixiang shi: Wo shi tamen de houyi chengzuo zai [nu ha shengren] manzai de chuanshang.
Wo wei tamen chuangzaole xiang chuan yiyang ke gong tamen cheng zai de jiaotong gongju.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo neng yan si tamen,[na shi tamen jiang gao sheng qiujiu], tamen jiang meiyou jiuzhu zhe, ye de bu dao zhengjiu,
chufei you wo jiang shi de enhui.[Rang tamen] zhanshi xiangshou ba!

Mei dang you hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang weiju zai nimen zhiqian de [jinshi de monan] he zai nimen zhihou de [houshi de xingfa], yibian nimen shou ci min.”[Ru: Jiaru nimen xinyang yisilan jiao, yuan bi ouxiang chongbai, fucong an la bing xingshan deng, nimen bi shou ci min, dan tamen hao bu zhuyi.]
Mei dang tamen de zhu [an la] de yi zhong jixiang jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi beiqi ta.

Mei dang you hua sheng dui tamen shuo “nimen dang shiyong an la ciyu nimen de [caiwu]” shi, bu xinyang zhe jiu dui xinshi shuo:“Jiaru an la yiyu, ta hui gongyang ta, women hebi gongyang ta ne? Nimen que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, zhege jinggao [fuhuo ri] he shi shixian ne?”
Tamen suo dengdai de zhishi yisheng nahan [kongbu sheng], tamen zheng zhenglun shi, nahan sheng xijile tamen.
Tamen jiang buneng liu yizhu, ye wuneng hui dao ziji de jiaren shenbian.
Haojiao [di er ci] yi chui xiang, tamen turan cong fenmu zhong chulai, jimang ben xiang tamen de zhu.

Tamen jiang shuo:“Women zhen daomei! Shi shei cong women de shuimian zhong ba women huanxing de?”[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi pu ci zhi zhu [an la] suozuo de xunuo, shizhemen shuo de shi shihua [zhu].”
Zhi ting yisheng nahan [kongbu sheng], tamen dou bei dai dao wo zheli [shoushen].
Jintian [fuhuo ri], renhe ren dou bu shou sihao kuidai, nimen zhi yi nimen cengjing suo zuo de [shan e] er shou baochou [zhu].
Zai na ri, leyuan de jumin jiang congshi yu kuaile zhi shi.
Tamen he tamen de qizi jiang zhishen yu [liangshuang de] yinliang zhong, kao zai bao yi shang [xiangle].
Tamen zai leyuan li yao shuiguo jiu you shuiguo, tamen yao shenme jiu you she me.
“Ping'an” shi pu ci zhi zhu [zhu][an la] suo zhi de zhuci.
[You hua sheng dui fanzui de renmen shuo]:“Fanzui de renmen a! Jintian nimen bixu likai [xinshi]le.
A dan de houyi a! Nandao wo meiyou zhufuguo nimen ma: Nimen buyao chongbai emo, ta que shi nimen mingxian de diren,
nimen zhi neng chongbai wo, zhe cai shi zhengdao.
Emo que yi shi nimen zhong de xuduo ren mi wu, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Zhe jiushi nimen suo bei jinggao de huo yu.
Youyu nimen [shengqian] bu xinyang, jintian nimen bixu jinru huo yu [shou huoxing].”
Zai na ri, wo jiang fengbi tamen de zui, tamen de shou jiang dui wo shuohua, tamen de jiao jiang zuozheng tamen cengjing suo zuo de shan e.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi xiaochu tamen de yanjing [shi tamen chengwei mangren], rang tamen mangmu xun dao.[Na shi] tamen zen neng kanjian [zhengdao] ne?
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen zai tamen de suozai zhi di bianxing [ru an la shi weifan jinling zhe bian cheng dongwu deng, jian 7:166], Ranhou, tamen ji buneng qianjin, ye buneng houtui.
Fanshi wo suo ciyu changshou zhe, wo neng zai chuangzao zhong shi ta daozhi [zhu][ru rensheng xia hou, shenti you ruo bian qiang, zuihou you you qiang bian ruo]. Nandao tamen hai buming li ma?
Wo meiyou jiaoshou ta [mu sheng] shige [zhu 1], shige ye bu shiyi ta [zhu 2]. Zhe zhishi yi xiang jiaohui he yi bu mingbai de “gulanjing”,
yibian ta [mu sheng huo “gulanjing”] jinggao huo ren [xinshi] bing panjue [chengfa] bu xinyang zhe [siren].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo ceng qinshou wei tamen chuangzaole shengchu, er tamen chengle shengchu de zhuren;
wo shi shengchu wei tamen fuwu, qizhong you gong tamen cheng zai de, you gong tamen chi de.
Tamen cong shengchu zhong hai ke huode xuduo yichu he ruzhi. Nandao tamen hai bu gan'en ma?
Tamen she an la er chongbai qita shenling, tamen zhiwang dedao naxie shenling de yuanzhu.
Naxie shenling wuneng yuanzhu tamen,[shenpan shi] tamen [naxie shenling] jiang bei ji hecheng jundui lai fanzheng tamen.
Buyao rang tamen de wangyan shi ni [mu sheng] youchou. Fanshi tamen suo yincang de he gongkai de, wo quan zhidao.
Nandao ren bu zhidao ma? Wo yong yidi jingye chuangzaole ta, er ta mashang chengle yige gongkai de zhengbian zhe.
Ta [ren] na wo [an la] she biyu, er ta [ren] wangjile ziji de chuangzao guocheng. Ta shuo:“Shei neng shi kugu fuhuo ne?”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Zuichu chuangzao ta de zhu [an la] jiang shi ta fuhuo. Ta [an la] shi quanzhi ge zhong chuangzao wu de.
Ta wei nimen er cong lu shu shang chuangzao huo, nimen mashang congzhong ran huo.”
Nandao chuangzao tiandi de zhu [an la] buneng chuangzao xiang tamen yiyang de ren ma? Juedui neng! Ta que shi zui shanyu chuangzao de, quanzhi de.
Dang ta yu zuo yi jian shiwu shi, ta zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
Zanmei zhangwo wanshi wanwu de zhu [an la] chaojue! Nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Yi lie ban zhe [tianshi] fashi,
yi shan qu yun zhe [tianshi] fashi,
yi chuanda jiaohui [“gulanjing”] zhe [tianshi] fashi,
nimen ying chongbai de zhu que shi du yi de zhu [an la],

[ta] shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi taiyang sheng qi de suoyou difang de zhu [diqiu biaomian an jingxian pingfen wei ershisi qu, xiang lin liang ge shiqu xiangcha yi xiaoshi, suoyi taiyang meitian lunliu cong shijie gedi sheng qi, ji an la shi zhongshijie de zhu].
Wo que yi yong qunxing zhuangshi zuijin de tian,
bing fangfan suoyou panni de emo ruqin ta.
Tamen buneng qieting gaoceng [tianshimen] de tanhua, yinwei tamen cong ge fang bei sheji,
bei quzhu, tamen jiang shou yongjiu [huo tongku] de xingfa.
Dan zhi qieting yici de, jiang bei yige tan zhaozhi guang suo zhuiji.
Ni [mu sheng] wen tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] ba! Shi tamen geng nan chuangzao ne? Haishi wo suo chuangzao de [tiandi wanwu] geng nan chuangzao? Wo dique yong niantu chuangzaole tamen.
Bu, ni [dui tamen de aoman] gandao jingyi, er tamen que zai chaoxiao [ni he “gulanjing”].
Tamen yi shou jinggao, dan tamen bu chong shi.
Mei dang tamen kanjian [an la de] jixiang, tamen zong shi chaoxiao [jixiang].
Tamen shuo:“Zhe zhishi mingxian de moshu.
Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
Women [yi gu] de zuxian ye yao bei fuhuo ma?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shi de, nimen jiang beijian di bei fuhuo.”
Zhi ting yisheng jiaohan [di er ci chui xiang haojiao], tamen [bei fuhuo shi] turan dongzhangxiwang.
Tamen shuo:“Women zhen daomei! Zhe jiushi shenpan ri.”
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe jiushi nimen cengjing fouren de panjue ri.”
[You hua sheng dui tianshimen shuo]:“Nimen dang ba bu yi zhe he tamen de qizi, yiji tamen she an la er chongbai de [ouxiang] dou jihe qilai, ranhou ba tamen dai dao huo yu de lushang qu.
Nimen dang lanzhu tamen, tamen bi jiang bei shenwen [zhu].”
[Shenwen shi jiang dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen zenme la? Nimen weihe bu [xiang zai chenshi nayang] huzhu ne?”
Bu, jintian tamen jiang shi touxiang de.
Tamen jiang huxiang zou lai, bici zewen.
Tamen [zhuisui zhe] jiang [dui youpian tamen de ren] shuo:“Nimen zong shi cong youbian lai youpian women de [ji yong e xing youpian women].”
Tamen [youpian zhe] jiang shuo:“Bu, nimen yuan bushi xinshi.
Women ben wu quanli duifu nimen. Bu, nimen shi panni de minzhong.
[Xianzai] women ying shou women de zhu de panjue, women ying changshi [women ying shou de] xingfa.
Women zhi suoyi shi nimen mi wu, yinwei women yuanlai yeshi mi wu zhe.”
Zai na ri, tamen bi jiang tong shou xingfa.
Wo dique ruci chengzhi fanzui zhe.
Tamen jiushi zhe zhong ren: Mei dang youren dui tamen shuo “chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu” shi, tamen bian jiao'ao zi da [zhu][de fouren].
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women yao wei yige zhongle mo de shiren er fangqi women de shenling ma?”
Bu, ta [mu sheng] yi zhaoshi [tamen] zhenli [ru yisilan jiao he “gulanjing”], bing zhengshi [zhiqian de] shizhemen.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen [mai jia de yi jiaotu] bi jiang changshi tongku de xingfa,
nimen zhi yi nimen cengjing suo fan de zui'e er shou huan bao.”
Wei an la te xuan de pu renmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Zhexie [te xuan de pu] ren [zai leyuan li] bi jiang huode zhongsuozhouzhi de jiyang:
Ge zhong shuiguo, erqie tamen shi shou zunjing de,
zai enze de leyuan li,
mianduimian zuo zai bao yi shang,
zhen man xian jiu de beizi jiang chuandi gei tamen.
Na xian jiu yanse jiebai, yin zhe gandao weimei wubi.
Na xian jiu zhong wu mazui wu, tamen bu hui yinci er he zui [zhu].
Zai tamen de pangbian you mu bu xieshi de [zhi kan ziji de zhangfu], mei mu qingchun de qizi peiban,
tamen [de jiaonen qingchun] youru shou baohu de dan.
Tamen jiang huxiang zou lai, bici xunwen.
Tamen zhong you yiren shuo:“Wo [zai chenshi] you ge pengyou,
ta [chang wen wo] shuo:“Ni zhen de xiangxin [fuhuo] ma?
Nandao women si hou bian cheng chentu he kugu shi, women zhen de hai yao [yi women de xingwei er] shou baochou [chengfa] ma?”
Ta [na ren dui leyuan de tongban] shuo:“Nimen yuan wang xia kan ma?”
Yushi ta bian wang xia kan, kanjian ta [na wei pengyou] zai huo yu de zhongyang.
Ta [dui ta zai chenshi shi di na wei pengyou] shuo:“Yi an la fashi! Ni chadian er huile wo.
Ruguo meiyou wo de zhu de enhui, wo biding chengle bei dai wang [huo yu shouxing] zhe zhi yi.”
[Na wei jin leyuan de xinshi shuo]:“[Women yi jinru leyuan], chule women zuichu de siwang wai, women bu hui zai siwangle ma? Women bu hui zai shouchengfale ma?
Zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
Rang gongzuo zhe wei huode zhe zhong chenggong er nuli ba [zhu]!”
Zhe shi geng hao de kuandai ne? Haishi zan gumu shu?
Wo dique ba ta [zan gumu shu] zuowei dui bu yi zhe de zhemo.
Na [zan gumu shu] que shi huo yu diceng zhang chu de yi ke [kongbu] shu,
qi guozi xiang mo tou.
Tamen bi jiang chi na zhong shuiguo, bi jiang yi ci tian man du fu.
Ranhou, tamen bi jiang zai jia yin feishui, yibian fu zhong de shuiguo yu feishui hunhe [hou zai fu zhong gengjia feiteng].
Ranhou, tamen de guisu que shi huo yu.
Tamen bi jiang faxian tamen de zuxian yuan shi mi wu zhe.
Tamen congmang tazhe tamen de hou chen xingshi.
Zai tamen zhiqian, xuduo qian ren que yi mi wu.
Wo que yi zai tamen zhong paiqianguo xuduo jinggao zhe [shizhe].
Ni dang guancha bei jinggao zhe de jieju ruhe!
Wei an la te xuan de purenmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Nu ha que yi qiqiu wo, wo shi zui shanyu yingda de.
Wo zhengjiu ta he ta de jiaren tuolile da nan [yan si].
Wo shi ta de zisun chengwei xingcun zhe.
Wo shi ta zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
Zhong shijie dou youren qiu zhu ci nu ha ping'an!
Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta que shi wo de xinyang de pu ren zhi yi.
Ranhou, wo yan sile qiyu de ren [bu xinyang zhe].
Zunxing ta [nu ha] de dao [yisilan jiao] de ren zhong que you yi bu la xin.
Dangshi, ta [yi bu la xin] daizhe yi ke chunjie de xinling lai jian ta de zhu.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Nimen zai chongbai shenme?
Nandao nimen yao she an la er xunqiu xujia de shenling ma?
Nimen shi ruhe wang cai zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la] de?”
Ranhou, ta [yi bu la xin] kanle qunxing yiyan,
ta shuo:“Wo biding shi huan [wenyi] bingle [ta yong ci ji, yibian liu zai tamen de simiao zhong cuihui naxie ouxiang].”
Yinci, tamen bian zhuanshen likaile ta [pa ci bing chuanran tamen].
[Tamen buzai shi], ta qiaoqiao zou dao tamen de ouxiangmen mianqian shuo:“Nimen weihe bu chi [gongfeng zai nimen mianqian de] gongwu ne?
Nimen weihe bu shuohua ne?”
Yushi ta yong youshou toutou da tamen.
Tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] jimang xiang ta pao lai.
Ta [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen yao chongbai nimen suo diaosu de ouxiang ma?
An la chuangzaole nimen he nimen suo zhizao de.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen wei ta jian yige huolu ba! Ranhou ba ta tou jin liehuo zhong [shaozhuo].”
Tamen xiang mouhai ta, dan wo que shi tamen bian cheng zui beixia de [zhu].
Ta [cong huo zhong bei jiu hou] shuo:“Wo yao dao wo de zhu nali qu, ta hui yindao wo.
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni ci gei wo yige shanliang de erzi ba!”
Yinci, wo yi yige kuanhou de erzi [yi si ma yi] xiang ta baoxi.

Dang ta [yi si ma yi] zhang dao neng yu ta yiqi zuoshi shi, ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Wo de erzi a! Wo dique meng jian wo jiang zai ni zuo [xian gei an la de] xisheng wu. Ni kaolu yixia, ni you she me yijian?” Ta [yi si ma yi] shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni zhixing ni suo feng dao de mingling ba! Jiaru an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren zhe.”
Dang ta lia yi guishun an la, ta [yi bu la xin] shi ta [yi si ma yi] de lian chao de ce tangzhe [zhunbei zai] shi,
wo [an la] zhaohuan ta:“Yi bu la xin a!
Ni que yi zhengshile nage meng.” Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Zhe que shi yi xiang mingxian de kaoyan.
Wo yi yi zhi weida de xisheng wu [yi zhi gong mianyang] shule ta.
Wo shi ta zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
“Ci yi bu la xin ping'an!”
Wo ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta que shi wo de xinyang de puren.
Wo hai yi jishi xianzhi you shi shanren de yi si ha ge xiang ta baoxi.
Wo ci fu ta he yi si ha ge. Ta lia de houyi zhong, you xingshan zhe, you gongran zibaoziqi zhe.
Wo que yi shi en gei mu sa [zhu 1] he [ta di gege] ha lun [zhu 2].
Wo ceng zhengjiu ta lia he ta lia de zuren tuoli da nan.
Wo ceng yuanzhu tamen, yinci tamen chengle shengli zhe.
Wo ci gei ta lia mingbai de jingdian.
Wo yindao ta lia zunxing zhengdao.
Wo shi ta lia zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
“Ci mu sa he ha lun ping'an!”
Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta lia que shi wo de xinyang de puren.
Yi lei ya si que shi shizhe zhi yi.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de zuren shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Nandao nimen yao qiqiu ba er lei [yi lei ya si de zuren chongbaiguo de zhuming ouxiang] er fangqi zui hao de chuangzao zhe
——an la, nimen de zhu he nimen de zuxian de zhu ma?”
Dan tamen fouren ta [yi lei ya si], suoyi, tamen bi jiang bei dai qu [shou huo yu de xingfa],
wei an la te xuan de purenmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Wo shi ta zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming.
“Ci yi lei ya si ping'an!”
Wo dique ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Ta que shi wo de xinyang de puren zhi yi.
Lu te que shi shizhe zhi yi.
Dangshi, wo zhengjiule ta he ta de quanbu jiaren,
liu zai houmian [gai huimie] de yi wei lao fu [ta de qizi] chuwai.
Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren [ru sihai pang suo duo ma cheng de jumin].
Nimen dique zhaoxi dou zai jingguo tamen de yizhi, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
You nu si que shi shizhe zhi yi [zhu].
Dangshi, ta tao dao na sou manzai de chuanshang.
Ta [tongyi] chouqian [zhu], dan ta shibaile.
Yitiao da yu tunle ta, ta [de xingwei] shi ying shou qianze de.
Jiaru ta bushi chang zansong an la zhe,
ta biding liu zai yu fu zhong, zhidao tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na yitian.
Wo ba ta reng zai guangtutu di hai'an, na shi ta shi you bing de.
Wo shi yi ke hulu ke de zhiwu zhang zai ta shangmian [gaizhe ta].
Wo paiqian ta qu jiaohua shi wan huo geng duo de ren.
Tamen xiangxin ta, suoyi, wo shi tamen zhanshi xiangle.
Ni [mu sheng] wen wen tamen [bu xinyang zhe]:“Nandao nuhai gui ni de zhu, er nanhai gui tamen ma?
Haishi wo ceng ba tianshi zaocheng nuxing de, er tamen keyi zuozheng ne?”
Xuzhi, tamen [gu lai shen de yi jiaotu] biding niezao huangyan shuo:
“An la you ernule [tamen ba tianshimen dang zuo an la de nu'er].” Tamen dique zai shuohuang.
Nandao ta yao nuhai er buyao nanhai ma?
Nimen zenme la? Nimen zenme [ruci] panduan?
Nandao nimen hai bu xingwu ma?
Haishi nimen you mingzheng ne?
Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, nimen jiu na chu nimen de jingdian lai ba!
Tamen niezao ta [an la] yu jingling zhi jian you xueqin guanxi, er jingling que yi zhidao [fuhuo ri] ziji bi jiang bei dai qu shenwen.
Zanmei an la chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Wei an la te xuan de pu renmen [zhen xinshi] liwai.
Nimen he nimen suo chongbai de [ouxiang],
jue buneng you ren [xinshi] beili ta [an la],
zhuding ru huo yu [shou huoxing] zhe chuwai.
[Tianshimen shuo]:“Women [tianshi] mei ge dou you yige zhouzhi de weizhi.
Women que shi chang lie ban de [ru musilin libai lie ban yiyang].
Women que shi chang zansong an la de.”
Tamen [alabo ren de yi jiaotu] dique chang shuo:
“[Zai mu sheng wei sheng qian] jiaru women you qian ren de jiaohui,
women yiding shi an la te xuan de pu ren.”
[Xianzai “gulanjing” jiang shile, mu sheng wei shengle], dan tamen reng bu xinyang [zhu][mu sheng he “gulanjing”], tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [bu xinyang de houguo].
Wo dui wo suo paiqian de pu renmen [shizhemen] dique youyanzaixian:
Tamen que shi huosheng zhe.
Wo de jundui que shi shengli zhe.
Suoyi, ni [mu sheng] zhanshi bi kai tamen ba!
Ni guancha tamen ba! Tamen bujiu jiang kanjian [xingfa].
Nandao tamen yao wo zaori shixian wo [dui tamen] de xingfa ma?
Dang wo de xingfa jianglin tamen de tingyuan shi [ji jianglin tamen], bei jinggao zhe de zaochen zhen elie!
Ni zhanshi bi kai tamen ba!
Ni guancha tamen ba! Tamen bujiu jiang kanjian [xingfa].
Zanmei ni de zhu——zun rong de zhu chaojue! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
“Ci shizhemen ping'an!”
Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——zhong shijie de zhu!

Chuzi tamen ben zu de yi wei jinggao zhe [mu sheng] yi daoda tamen, tamen [alabo ren de yi jiaotu] wei ci gandao jingya. Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Zhe [mu sheng] shige moshu shi, shige shuohuang zhe [zhu].
Nandao ta yao ba xuduo zhuzai bian cheng yige zhuzai [an la] chongbai ma? Zhe zhenshi jian guaishi.”
Tamen de shoulingmen qishen shuo:“Nimen zou ba! Nimen qu jianxin nimen de zhuzai ba! Zhe que shi jian you yumou de shi.
Women zai zuihou de zongjiao zhong meiyou ting daoguo ci shi, zhe zhishi yi zhong weizao.
Zai women zhexie ren zhong, nandao jiaohui [“gulanjing”] zhi jiang gei ta [mu sheng] ma?” Bu, tamen shi zai huaiyi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”]. Bu, tamen shangwei changshi wo de xingfa.
Nandao tamen yongyou ni de quanneng de, bo shi de zhu de enhui zhi ku ma?
Nandao tamen yongyou tiandi wanwu de zhuquan ma? Jiaru tamen you, rang tamen shefa pa shangtian qu ba!
[Youyu tamen fouren an la de qishi], tamen shi yi zhi jiang bei dabai de jundui, youru yiqian meng jun [bei dabai] yiyang.
Zai tamen zhiqian fouren shizhemen de you: Nu ha de zuren, a de ren, yongyou dajun de falao,
sa mu de ren, lu te de zuren he conglin de jumin, zhexie ren shi tonglei.
Tamen dou fouren [tamen de] shizhemen, suoyi, wo [dui tamen] de chengfa shixianle.
Zhexie ren zhi dengdai yisheng ju xiang [ru yi si la fei lei tianshi chui xiang haojiao], na ju xiang hao bu tingdun.
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zai qingsuan riqian, qiu ni rang women zaori kanjian women gongguo de jilu ba!”
Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni dang rennai. Ni dang laoji wo de qiangda de puren da wude, ta que shi yongyuan gui xin'an la de.
Wo que yi shi qun shan tong ta yiqi zao [ri chu zhi zhengwu] wan [wuhou zhi riluo] zansong wo.
[Wo que yi shi] zhong niao jihe qilai, quanbu tong ta [da wude] yiqi gui xin wo [bing zansong wo].
Wo shi ta de wangguo qiangda, wo ci gei ta zhihui heshan bian de yanci [zhu].
Susong zhe de gushi daoda nile ma? Dangshi, tamen yue qiang er runei dian [woshi].

Dangshi, tamen qu jian da wude, er ta haipa jian tamen. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa![Women shi] liang ge susong zhe, women zhong de yiren qirule ling yiren, qing ni wei women binggong caijue, qing ni buyao piantan [women renhe yifang], qing ni zhiyin women zhengdao.

Zhe wei jiushi wo de xiongdi [bingfei qin xiongdi, zhi xinyang shang de xiongdi, yin wei an la shuo:“Xinshi jie xiongdi.”(Jian 49:10)], Ta you jiushijiu zhi mu mianyang, er wo zhiyou yi zhi, dan ta [dui wo] shuo:“Ni ba na zhi yang gei wo ba!” Ta zai bianlun zhong zhanshengle wo.”

Ta [da wude wei ting duifang bianjie jiu] shuo:“Ta yaoqiu ni ba ni di na zhi mu mianyang bing ru ta de [99 zhi] mu mianyang zhong [cou zu 100 zhi], ta que yi qifu ni. You xuduo tongshi que shi huxiang qiru de, wei xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai, dan zhexie ren shi shaoshu.” Da wude caixiang wo [an la] zai kaoyan ta, suoyi, ta bian qiu ta de zhu [an la] kuanshu [ta], bing baidao xiaqu, xiang an la huizui. Koutou chu
wo kuanshule ta de guocuo, ta dique huodele jiejin wo [de xuke] he youmei de guisu [leyuan].

Da wude a! Wo que yi renming ni wei da dishang de jiren zhe, suoyi, ni dang ti renmen binggong caijue, ni buyao shuncong siyu, yimian siyu shi ni beili an la zhi dao. Fan beili an la zhi dao zhe, tamen bi yin tamen wangji qingsuan ri er shou yanli de xingfa.
Wo bingfei hao wu mudi er chuangzao tiandi wanwu, na shi bu xinyang zhe de wang cai. Bu xinyang zhe jiang shou huo yu zhi xing zhen huogai!
Nandao wo duidai xinyang bing xingshan zhe hui xiang duidai da dishang de zuo'e zhe ma? Nandao wo duidai jingwei zhe hui xiang duidai xie'e zhe [fanzui zhe] ma?
[Zhe] shi wo suo jiang shi ni [mu sheng] de yi bu jixiang de jingdian [“gulanjing”], yibian tamen shensi ta [“gulanjing”] de jing wen, yibian you lizhi de renmen juewu.
Wo ba su lai man ciyu da wude. Su lai man shi duome youxiu de yi wei puren a! Ta que shi yongyuan gui xin'an la de.
Dangshi, youren zai bangwan ba yi pi xunlian you su de junma xian gei ta [wei an la zhi dao zhandou].
Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Ai! Wo ku'ai zhexie junma er wangjile zan nian wo de zhu [wangji li bu libai], zhidao [bu li de] shijian guoqu, yemu jianglin [ci shi li bu libai de shijian yi jieshu].”
[Ranhou ta shuo]:“Nimen ba tamen [ma] gan lai gei wo ba!” Ta yong shou paida ma tui he jing bu.
Wo que yi kaoyanguo su lai man. Wo ceng ba yige emo fang zai ta de baozuo shang [gu ta shiqule yiduan shijian de wangwei], ranhou ta gui xin wo [bing xiang wo huizui].
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu wo, qiu ni ci gei wo yige zai wo zhihou bu shuyu renhe ren de wangguo. Ni que shi hou shi de.”
Wo shi feng wei ta fuwu, feng feng ta de mingling rouhe de chui xiang ta xiangdao da di difang.
[Wo hai shi] ge zhong neng jianzhu de he neng qianshui de emo,
yiji qita dai jiaoliao de emo [wei ta fuwu].
[An la dui su lai man shuo]:“Zhe shi wo de enci, ni keyi [dui tamen] shi en [ru shifang naxie emo], ye keyi [ba tamen] liu xia, bu hui shou qingsuan.”
Ta dique huodele jiejin wo [de xuke] he youmei de guisu [leyuan].
Ni dang laoji wo de puren ai you bu [zhu]. Dangshi, ta qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Emo que yi shi wo zaoshou tongku [sun shen] he chengfa [shi cai].”
[Wo mingling ta shuo]:“Ni duojiao ba! Zhe shi ke gong muyu he yinyong de liangshui.”
Wo ba ta de jiaren he yu tamen xiangtong de renshu ci hai ta, zhe shi cong wo jiang shi de enhui, shi dui you lizhi de renmen de jiaohui.

[Wo dui ta shuo]:“Ni dang yong shou na yi ba cao qu da [ni de qizi]. Ni buyao weibei shiyan.” Wo dique faxian ta shi jianren zhe. Ta shi duome youxiu de yi wei puren a! Ta que shi yongyuan gui xin'an la de.
Ni dang laoji wo de puren yi bu la xin, yi si ha ge, ya gubu, tamen dou shi you jingli [chongbai wo] de, dou shi you zongjiao zhishi de.
Wo te xuan tamen, bing ci tamen zan zhu zhi wu [ru tamen zai qizhong quan ren guishun an la ji wei houshi xingshan deng].
Zai wo kan lai, tamen que shi te xuan de, que shi zui youxiu de.
Ni dang laoji yi si ma yi, ai lei ye sai a, zu le ke fu lei, quan shi zui youxiu de.
Zhe shi yi xiang jiaohui. Jingwei zhe bi jiang huode youmei de guisu——
[changzhu] yongjiu de leyuan, yuan menjiang wei tamen chang kai [zhu].
Tamen zai leyuan li, kao zai bao yi shang, jiao ren na lai ge zhong shuiguo he yinliao.
Zai tamen de pangbian you mu bu xieshi [zhi kan ziji de zhangfu], tongling de qizi peiban.
Zhe shi wei qingsuan ri er yingxu nimen [jingwei zhe] de.
Zhe jiushi wo [ci gei nimen] de jiyang, ta shi qu zhi bu jin de.
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Panni zhe bi jiang huode elie de guisu——
[yong ju] huo yu. Tamen jiang bei reng ru huo yu zhong [shou huoxing]. Guisu zhen elie!
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Rang tamen changshi xingfa ba! Na shi ji re de feishui he ji leng de zang wu [ru nong zhi],
hai you qita ge zhong tongyang yanli de xingfa.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe shi yiqun tong nimen yidao chuang ru huo yu de ren, tamen shi bu shou huanying de, tamen bi zai huo yu zhong [shou huoxing].”

Tamen [mangmu gensui wu ru huo yu zhe] jiang shuo:“Bu! Nimen [daitou ru huo yu zhe] cai shi bu shou huanying de, shi nimen [zai chenshi wudao women er] ba women you ru zhe zhong jingdi de. Guisu zhen elie!”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Shei ba women you ru zhe zhong jingdi, qiu ni shi shei zai huo yu li shou jiabei de xingfa.”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women zenme meiyou kanjian women [zai chenshi] ceng shi wei eren di naxie ren ne?
Nandao shi women ceng ba tamen dang xiaobing ma? Haishi women de shili shuaitui kan bujian tamenle?”
Zhe que shi zhenshi de, huo yu de fanren jiushi ruci zhenglun de.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo zhishi yi wei jinggao zhe, chu du yi weiyan de an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu.
[Ta shi] tiandi wanwu de zhu.[Ta shi] shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.”
Ni shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi yige zhongda de xiaoxi,
dan nimen beiqi ta.
Wo bu zhidao gaocengmen [tianshimen] bici zhenglun [a dan shengren de chuangzao] shi de qingkuang.
Wo suo feng dao de qishi shi: Wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Dangshi, ni de zhu dui tianshimen shuo:“Wo jiang yong nitu chuangzao yige ren [a dan].
Dang wo zao wan ta bing ba linghun chui ru ta de tinei shi, nimen dang fushou fucong.”
Suoyou tianshi dou fucongle,
wei yi bu lisi bu ken fucong, ta aoman, ta yuan shi bu xinyang zhe.
Ta [an la] shuo:“Yi bu lisi a! Shi shenme zuzhi ni bu fucong wo qinshou chuangzao de ren ne? Ni shi aoman? Haishi ni shi gaoshang de?”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo bi ta [a dan] youyue, ni yong huo chuangzao wo, er yong nitu chuangzao ta.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni cong zheli [leyuan] chuqu ba! Ni que shi bei fangzhu de.
Wo dui ni de qianze, zhidao shenpan ri.”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuan yan wo dao tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na yitian ba!”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni bei kuan yanle,
zhidao zhuding de shi ri [fuhuo ri].”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Yi ni de zun rong fashi! Wo bi jiang ba tamen quanbu you ru qitu,
sa de [alabo yu yige zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi], yi chongman jiaohui de “gulanjing” fashi!
Bu! Buxinyang zhe xianrule wangzizunda he beini zhong.
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen [gao sheng] hujiu shi, taowang de shijian yi shiqu.
Wei tamen zhong ni te xuan de purenmen [zhen xinshi] liwai [zhu].”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Zhe shi zhenli, wo shuo de jiushi zhenli.
Wo bi jiang yong ni he tamen [renlei] zhong zhuisui ni de ren yiqi tian man huo yu.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo bu hui wei ci [xuanchuan “gulanjing”] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo ye bushi jiamao de.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] zhishi dui zhong shijie de yi xiang jiaohui,
nimen bujiu bi jiang zhidao ta [“gulanjing”] de zhenxiang.”
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong quanneng de, zui ruizhi de an la jiang shi de.
Wo que yi jiang shi ni [mu sheng] zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian, suoyi, ni dang chongbai an la, dang qiancheng jingyi fucong ta [zhu].

Xuzhi, yisilan jiao [de chongbai he shuncong] zhi wei an la. Naxie she an la er ling qiu baohu zhe [ouxiang] de ren [shuo]:“Women chongbai tamen [ouxiang], zhi weile tamen neng shi women jiejin an la.” An la bi jiang wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de. An la jue bu yindao shuohuang zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe.
Jiaru an la yu you erzi, ta yiding hui cong ta de chuangzao wu zhong tiaoxuan tasuo yiyu de. Zanmei ta chaojue! Ta shi du yi weiyan de an la.

Ta yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi. Ta shi heiye jinru baizhou, shi baizhou jinru heiye, bing shi ri yue [wei nimen fuwu], mei ge dou an guiding de chengxu yunxing. Xuzhi, ta shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.

Ta [an la] you yige ren [a dan shengren] chuangzaole nimen, ranhou, ta you nage ren chuangzaole ta de qizi [ha wa]. Ta wei nimen er jiangxia ba zhi peidui de shengchu [yi dui mianyang (gong de yu mu de), yi dui shanyang (gong de yu mu de), yi dui niu (gong de yu mu de), yi dui luotuo (gong de yu mu de)]. Ta ba nimen chuangzao yu nimen de mu fu zhong, zai sanchong hei'an zhong fanfu chuangzao nimen. Zhe shi an la, shi nimen de zhu. Zhuquan shi ta de, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Nimen zenme hai yao beili ne?

Jiaru nimen wang'enfuyi, name, an la que shi wu qiu yu nimen de. Ta bu xihuan wang'enfuyi de pu ren. Jiaru nimen [chengwei xinshi bing] gan'en, name, ta jiang xiyue nimen. Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e. Ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao nimen de zhu nali qu, ta jiang ba nimen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu nimen. Ta dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.

Dang ren zaoyu buxing shi, ta jiu qiqiu ta de zhu [an la] bing gui xin ta [qie xiang ta huizui]. Ranhou, dang ta [an la] ciyu ta [ren] enhui shi, ta [ren] bian wangjile ta yiqian suo qiqiu de, bing gei an la shezhi xuduo [yu an la tongdeng de] chongbai duixiang, yibian you ren beili ta [an la] de dao. Ni shuo:“Ni zhanshi xiangshou ni de bu xin ba! Ni que shi huo yu de fanren.”

[Shei de xingwei geng hao ne?] Shi zheng ye qianchengwei zhu [libai] koutou, zhanli, jinfang houshi bing kewang ta de zhu de enhui de ren ne?[Haishi bu xinyang zhe?] Ni shuo:“You zhishi de renmen yu wu zhishi de renmen xiangdeng ma [zhu]? Wei you lizhi de renmen caineng juewu.”

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de xinyang de pu renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei nimen de zhu [an la]. Zai jinshi xingshan de renmen bi you shan bao [zhu 1]. An la de dadi shi kuankuo de [ruguo jia di buneng chongbai an la, ke dao yi di chongbai an la]. Wei jianren zhe caineng wuxian liang huode tamen ying de de baochou [zhu 2].
Ni shuo:“Wo yi fengming zhi chongbai an la, zhi qiancheng jingyi fucong ta [zhu].
Wo yi fengming cheng wei shouxian guishun de ren [musilin].”
Ni shuo:“Jiaru wo weikang wo de zhu, wo dique weiju zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.”
Ni shuo:“Wo zhi chongbai an la, zhi qiancheng jingyi fucong ta.
Nimen yao she ta chongbai shenme jiu chongbai shenme ba!” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Sunshi zhe que shi zai fuhuo ri shi tamen ziji he jiaren shou sun zhe. Xuzhi, zhe que shi zui mingxian de sunshi.”
Zai tamen de shangmian you huo fugaizhe, zai tamen de xiamian yeyou huo fugaizhe. Zhe shi an la yong lai jinggao ta de pu renmen de.[An la shuo]:“Wo de pu renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei wo.”
Fan yuanli chongbai emo, gui xin'an la [bing huizui] zhe, tamen jiang huode jiayin. Ni xiang wo de pu renmen baoxi ba!

Tamen [wo de pu renmen] qingting shan yan [ru “chu an la wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu” deng] bing zunxing qi zui hao de [ru ren zhu du yi, bu chongbai ouxiang deng]. Zhexie ren que shi an la suo yindao de ren, zhexie ren que shi you lizhi de ren [ru zai de•ben•a mu er•ben•nu fa lei, sa lei man•fa er xi he ai bu•zai er•ji fa li deng].
Ying shou xingfa panjue de ren,[yu bu ying shou xingfa panjue de ren xiangdeng ma?] Nandao ni [mu sheng] neng zhengjiu huo yu zhong de ren ma?

Danshi, fan jingwei tamen de zhu [an la] de ren, tamen [zai leyuan li] jiang huode gaoji zhuzhai, lou shang you lou, zhu he cong xiamian liuguo.[Zhe shi] an la de xunuo, an la shi jue bu shuangyue de.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru dixia, huiliu cheng quan, ranhou, jie ci er shengzhang chu wuyanliuse de zhuangjia [zhu], ranhou shi ta kuwei, ni kanjian ta bian huang, ranhou ta [an la] shi ta bian cheng suipian. Dui you lizhi de renmen, ci zhong que you yi zhong jiaohui.

An la shi qi xinxiong xiang yisilan jiao changkai zhe, ta zunxing ta de zhu de guangming,[zhe zhong ren tong fei musilin xiangdeng ma?] Dui zan nian an la xin ying zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai! Zhexie ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.

An la jiang shile zuimei de yanci, yi bu neirong yinhui, chaofan qie fanfu shenshu de jingdian [“gulanjing”].[Dang youren songdu “gulanjing” huo tingjian qi songdu sheng shi] fan weiju tamen de zhu de ren de jifu jiang wei ci er chandou. Ranhou, tamen de jifu he xin jiang yin zan nian an la er bian de rouhe. Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi an la de zhengdao, ta yi ci yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao [zhu]. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou yindao zhe.
Fuhuo ri yi mianbu fangyu [huo yu de] yanxing zhe [yu ping'an jinru leyuan zhe xiangdeng ma]? You hua sheng dui bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen dang changshi nimen suo fanzui'e de chengfa.”
Tamen de qian ren ye tongyang fourenguo, yinci, xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang jianglin tamen.
An la shi tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong changshi lingru, dan houshi de xingfa cai shi zui yanli de. Yaoshi tamen zhidao duo hao a!
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong wei renlei shezhi ge zhong biyu, yibian tamen jieshou jiaohui.
[Zhe shi yi bu] alabo wen de “gulanjing”, qizhong hao wu waiqu [zhu][cuangai], yibian tamen jingwei.

An la she ge biyu: Yige ren [nuli] shuyu yi huo huxiang zhengchao zhe [ru ji bai an la you bai ouxiang zhe] suoyou, er ling yige ren [nuli] ze wanquan shuyu yige zhuren [ru zhi bai du yi de an la zhe] suoyou. Zhe liang ren de qingkuang xiangtong ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Ni [mu sheng] bi jiang shi yao siwang de, tamen ye bi jiang shi yao siwang de [zhu].
Ranhou, fuhuo ri, nimen bi jiang zai nimen de zhu nali huxiang zhengbian.
